actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the distance requirements applicable to the deduction for moving expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from 35 miles to 200 miles the minimum distance requirement applicable to the deduction allowed for moving expenses.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the distance requirements applicable to the deduction for moving expenses.
